root.p:
Search for the item your require (You can also search for product IDs)
Click on the more link or image of the item you want to buy
The items details will be displayed
While viewing the items details, you may buy the item by:
Adding the item to cart: Click the Add to cart button to add the item to your shopping cart. Click the View cart button to view your shopping cart at any time. Follwing the instructions from the shopping cart to buy the item.
Contacting the seller directly: Click the contact source or contact seller etc button to contact the source of the selected item directly.
